about_the_game:
In the seemingly medieval world of Eras Rising...



...something strange is afoot! Beasts have suddenly appeared, ravaging the countryside! Some of them appear to be more machine than flesh and bone. Lead a small group of warriors as they endeavor to discover more about these beasts, and perhaps even the world in which they live...


Eras Rising has you venture through a vibrant 2.5D pixel art landscape! Upon stumbling across an enemy, the camera transitions to a top-down view of the encounter grid. In these tactical turn-based battles, command your party to successfully defeat the creatures. Take the advantage and manipulate enemies with abilities that push or pull them into more favorable positions.


Watch out for special terrain tiles can either help or hinder your party, granting units standing on them incredible boons or debilitating debuffs. Making use of your position is key to success in Eras Rising, so outmaneuver your foes and force them to fight on your terms!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, or Windows 11

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: In Eras Rising, follow a party of warriors as they journey to uncover why strange beasts have suddenly begun invading their homeland. Manipulate the enemy position and use terrain to your advantage to fend off the beasts in turn-based tactical combat!
